author: boudoul
body:
Updating runthematrix cosmic WFs with the latest and greatest 2018 Cosmic GTs
The corresponding WFs are 7.2 , 7.3, 7.4
This PR should be tested with #25131 - Can only be merged after it (this PR is using a GT defined there)

Thanks @lpernie for having provided the GTs

@mmusich @tsusa FYI
title: Moving to 2018 Cosmic WFs
